email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for a laycan of October 15-20. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider a rate in the mid-40s, say $45.50 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $45.50 is a bit tight given current market conditions. However, I can offer a revised rate of $48.00 per metric ton. As for demurrage, it’s set at $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $48.00 is closer to our target. Could we settle at $47.25 per metric ton? Also, can we confirm the laycan remains October 15-20? Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can agree to $47.25 per metric ton. The laycan remains October 15-20, and demurrage is confirmed at $20,000 per day pro rata. If this works for you, I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Let me know. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $47.25 works for us. Please proceed with drafting the charter party agreement. Let’s aim to finalize by end of day. Thanks for your flexibility. Best, John
